articles.author: Deena Zaru, Bill Hutchinson
articles.title: 'A living nightmare': Palestinian-American student injured in Vermont shooting breaks silence - ABC News
articles.description: Kinnan Abdalhamid was among three students of Palestinian descent who were shot.
articles.content: Kinnan Abdalhamid, a Palestinian-American student who was injured in a shooting in Burlington, Vermont, on Saturday spoke out for the first time since the incident in an interview that aired on ABC's… [+4222 chars]
